Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory29.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "I can't thank you enough!"}
{2: "You're Komori, right?", 3: '4'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Komori', 3: 'Yes! And you must have been sent by Sagawa!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Komori', 3: "If it weren't for you, we would never have made it back in one piece..."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Komori', 3: 'These parts are getting more dangerous by the day...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Komori', 3: 'Sagawa always wants us to move to somewhere else, but the elder always opposes the idea.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Komori', 3: "If even the elder's son can't change his father's mind, what chance do we have..."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'I see... so that\'s why Sagawa said he was going to "force his father\'s hand," huh?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Komori', 3: 'What? He said that?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Komori', 3: 'Does that mean... Oh, crap!'}
{1: '1', 3: 'As if alarmed by some bad news, Komori turns on her heel and runs off.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Komori', 3: 'Sagawa!'}
{1: '1', 3: 'When you follow Komori back to the Towerfolk settlement, you see Sagawa tied up like a bundle.'}
{1: '1', 3: '...Surrounded by Towerfolk citizens who are armed and on the alert.'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'Credit where credit is due. You managed to get Babylonia to send us help...'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'But trying to get Towerfolk citizens to leave the tower is a serious crime.'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'You must be punished, if not by death then by pain!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sagawa', 3: "Come on, let's face it! The Corrupted have their eyes on this place!"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sagawa', 3: "If we don't leave soon, we'll all be dead!"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Elder', 3: "Occasional harassment is not going to kill us... And as soon as the KCC's mercs get here..."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sagawa', 3: "Stop kidding yourself! Our last two years' harvest will barely pay for those mercs!"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Towerfolk Citizen', 3: 'Elder! The Corrupted have penetrated the outer barrier!'}
{2: 'Wake up to reality.', 3: '34'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Elder', 3: "So what... We don't even have time to pack our things."}
{1: '1', 3: 'If we leave the tower like this... our lives will be doomed.'}
{2: 'Babylonia will help.', 3: '37'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Elder', 3: "Go knock on the door of every household! Tell them to pack their most valuable belongings. We're leaving!"}
